doc.previous: On 25 September 2009 Palau announced that it would create the world s first shark sanctuary 32 Palau banned all commercial shark fishing within its EEZ waters The sanctuary protects about 600 000 square kilometres 230 000 sq mi of ocean 33 a similar size to France 34 35 36 President Johnson Toribiong announced the sanctuary at a meeting of the United Nations 34 37 38 President Toribiong proposed a worldwide ban on fishing for sharks 34 In 2012 Palau received the Future Policy Award from World Future Council because Palau is a global leader in protecting marine ecosystems 39
doc.after: Palau s economy consists primarily of tourism subsistence agriculture and fishing Tourist activity focuses on scuba diving and snorkeling in the islands rich marine environment including its barrier reefs walls and World War II wrecks The government is the major employer relying heavily on US financial assistance Business and tourist arrivals numbered some 50 000 in financial year 2000 2001
